definition: just by chance/to happen to (just at the right time)/opportune
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: At the mean time, the vulture went by. The potion was polluted by the unexpectedly fallen hair.
sentences.chinese: 同时，秃鹰正巧经过，秃鹰的头发无意间落入魔药内。

sentences.english: Among the companies that "donated" money were both of the major construction companies of the country.
sentences.chinese: 捐钱的企业正巧都是国内主要的二大建设公司。

sentences.english: Mumble's dream girl, Gloria, happens to be the best singer around.
sentences.chinese: 曼宝的梦中情人格洛丽亚正巧是歌儿唱得最好的一个。

sentences.english: No, it's no distance at all. In fact I'm going the same direction.
sentences.chinese: 不，一点也不远，正巧我也往那边走。

sentences.english: The fruit dropped to the ground right at my feet.
sentences.chinese: 水果正巧掉在我的脚上。

sentences.english: That day was July 15 on the lunar calendar, the day of the Ghost Festival.
sentences.chinese: 当天，正巧是农历七月十五日中元节。

sentences.english: If you happen to pass by 84 Charing Cross Road, kiss it for me!
sentences.chinese: 如果你正巧经过查令十字街84号，能否为我吻它？

sentences.english: You were about to point at Tigress and that thing fell in front of her!
sentences.chinese: 你原来要指的是娇虎，可那个肉团正巧掉下来。

sentences.english: My own ex-spouse happens to think I changed my name too, and it breaks my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我的前夫正巧也认为我改了名，使我心碎。

sentences.english: There happened to be a telephone booth near the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 正巧有一个电话亭在公共汽车站附近。

sentences.english: She did not get the job because she just did not measure up.
sentences.chinese: 她没得到那份工作，因为她正巧不合标准。

sentences.english: One rainy night the policeman had a chance encounterwith a gang of smugglers.
sentences.chinese: 在一个雨夜，那个警察正巧碰上了一伙走私犯。

sentences.english: Or do you by any chance know the number?
sentences.chinese: 或者您正巧知道您的护照号码是多少？

sentences.english: He also worked as a department manager.
sentences.chinese: 正巧他也是个部门经理。

sentences.english: Was going to the locker room, Jane met just returned home shiva.
sentences.chinese: 正要去更衣间的珍，碰到正巧回到家的希瓦。

sentences.english: We happen to have some shirts on sale today.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天正巧有衬衫削价处理。

definition: too bad/unfortunately/as luck would have it
by coincidence/it so happened that/fortunately/against expectation
to be just about to/to be on the point of
to run into/to meet (unexpectedly)/to bump into
